subject: Economy
question_en: What is Gross Domestic Product (GDP) and how is it calculated?
question_hi: ग्रॉस ग्रॉबरड (GDP) क्या है और यह कैलेक्शन कैसे करता है?
A_en: GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders in a specific period of time (usually a year).
